00048 
00053   queue *getQueue(int prio){return &prioQ[prio];}
00054 
00059   int getQueueLen(int prio){return qLens[prio];}
00060 
00066   void setQueueLen(int prio, int len){qLens[prio] = len;}
00067 
00073   void setPrio(int inprio, int prio){priorities[inprio] = prio;}
00074   int getPrio(int inprio){return priorities[inprio];}
00075   int getLossPRIO(int trc){return this->lostPRIO[trc];}
00076   int nprio;           // # of queues
00077   double serviceRate;  // bitrate on output
00078   int act(void);       // init finalizer
00079   //tolua_end
00080   queue *prioQ;     // the queues
00081   int *qLens;       // each queue length is coppied -> simple export
00082   int *qByteLens;   // eaach queue length in bytes is coppied -> simple export
00083   int *priorities;  // mapping inprio -> priority
00084   unsigned int *lostPRIO; // loss per priority

00086     int prio;
00087   };

00090   inpPrioStruct *inpPrioPtr;
